func_sig.description: Solves for the third side of a right triangle using the Pythagorean Theorem when two side lengths are provided.
func_sig.name: solve_pythagorean_theorem

a.description: The length of one side (not the hypotenuse) of the triangle.

b.description: The length of the other side (not the hypotenuse) of the triangle.

func_sig.description: Calculate the Euclidean distance between two points in 3D space.
func_sig.name: calculate_distance_3d

func_sig.description: Calculate the volume of a cone given the radius and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_volume_cone

r.description: Radius of the base of the cone.

func_sig.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions provided as strings.
func_sig.name: evaluate_expression
